name: Mountain Province Diamonds Inc.
longDescription: Mountain Province Diamonds Inc is engaged in the discovery and development of diamond properties in Canada's Northwest Territories. The company holds interests in Gahcho Kue Diamond Mine in Canada's Northwest Territories as a joint venture partner with De Beers Canada. Its other projects include the Kennady North which covers a portion of the southeastern Slave Geological Province, an Archean terrain.

fullAddress: 161 Bay Street,Suite 1410, P.O. Box 216, Toronto, ON, CA
